sense.def:
Few
uporabljamo za izražanje majhnega števila stvari ali oseb.

seg.quote: The window opened a few inches.

sense.def:
Z besedo
few
tudi povemo, da je število stvari ali oseb manjše, kot je zaželeno ali pričakovano.

seg.quote: There are fewer trains at night.
Few of them ever reach their potential.

sense.def:
Kadar so stvari
few and far between
, so zelo redke in neobičajne.

Z izrazom
no fewer than
povemo, da je neko število presenetljivo veliko.

seg.quote: No fewer than five cameramen lost their lives.

sense.def:
Izraza
quite a few
in
a good few
uporabimo, kadar govorimo o kar velikem številu stvari ali oseb.

seg.quote: We had quite a few friendly arguments.
I spent a good few years of my life there.
